owl:Ontology.dc:title: DELTA ontology
owl:Ontology.rdfs:comment: This ontology represents the terms to allow interoperability in DELTA project. It models concepts related to enery market, smart grids and demand-response platforms, and it will reuse standard ontologies whenever possible.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:isDefinedBy: Relationship between a smart contract and the property it agrees on.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: agrees on

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:isDefinedBy: Relation between a virtual node and its associated aggregator.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: allocates

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relationship between a virtual node and the cluster it belongs to.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: belongs to cluster

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relation between an aggregator and the market settlement it consumes
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: consumes

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relationship between the FEID and the violation it detects.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: detects

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relationship identifying the properties associated to a group of entities, such as clusters.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has aggregated property

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relation to define the comfort settings of a system.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has comfort settings

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Link between a price and its currency
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has currency

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Link to the delivery time.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has delivery time

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Duration description of a violation, indicanting value and unit.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has duration description

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relationship between a violation condition and the current associated measurement that is estimated.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has estimated measurement

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relation between a property and its incentives associated.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has incentive

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Link between a Virtual Node and its index.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has index

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relation between a smart contract and the payment associated
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has payment

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Link between a phase and a measurement
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has phase

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Link between an entity and its profile
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has profile

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Redundancy of a FEID
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has redundancy
Relationship between a violation condition and the associated measurement that is required.
has required measurement

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Link between a customer and its associated reward
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has reward

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: link between the Virtual node and its smart contracts
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has smart contract

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Link to the grid constraints of a system
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has system constraint

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Link between a smart contracts and the transactions it stores
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has transaction

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relationship between a violation and all its conditions
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has violation condition

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relationship between a violation and a profile that describes such violation
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: includes profile

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Link from a virtual node to its aggregator
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is allocated in

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relation between an object and the geographical feature in which it is located at
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is located at

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Link between a device and its customer
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is owned by

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relationship between a profile and a device.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is profile of

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relationship between a violation and the related DVNs, FEIDs or Feeders.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isRelatedTo

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relationship between an action and the virtual node in charge of perform it
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is requested to

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Period where an entity, such a contract, is valid
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is valid during period

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relation between a Virutal Node and the devices it manages
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: manages

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Link between the customers and the devices
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: owns

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relationship between a grid violation and the requested property to solve it.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: requests

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relationship between a DR request and the needed measurement in order to solve a violation
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: requires measurement

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A spatial representation for a given feature.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasGeometry

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relationship indicating a composite entity that consists of other entities (e.g., a temperature/humidity sensor that consists of a temperature sensor and a humidity sensor)
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: consists of

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relationship identifying what an entity, such as a Profile, is about
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isAbout

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relationship between a measurement and the feature of interest whose quality was measured
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isMeasurementOf

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relationship specifying the property that can be measured by a certain device
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: makes measurement

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relationship specifying the property that can be measured by a certain device
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: measures property

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relationship between a property and the measurements it relates to
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: relates to measurement

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relationship between a measurement and the property it relates to
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: relates to property

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: is derived from
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is derived from

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: quantifies KPI
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: quantifies KPI

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relationship between a VE, Resource or Asset with the Group of targets associated
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: belongs to

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relationship between an event and its duration
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has duration

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A link between a node and the event it sends
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: sends event

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Granularity of the profile (e.g., weekly, daily)
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has granularity

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Points that are used by the DELTA platform to calculate the customers rewards
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has point

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Address of the service within the system.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has port

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Reliability associated to a virtual node
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has reliability

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Relationship between a violation and its type, which can be overvoltage, undervoltage or overloading.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has violation type

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: DR type that is implemented by the FEID, which can be implicit or explicit
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: implements DR type

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Value that indicates whether the FEID is available
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: is available

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The final status as if the DVN fullfiled the request or it failed
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: status

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A relationship stating the timestamp of an entity (e.g. a measurement).
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: timestamp

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A relationship defining the value of a certain property, e.g., energy or power. Note that, even if numeric values are expected to enable reasoning, measurement values could use other datatypes.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has value

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Action that is requested by a FEID
owl:Class.rdfs:label: DR request

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Legal entities that aggregate the load or generation of various demand and/or generation/production units and aim at optimizing energy supply and consumption.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Aggregator
Asset
Element contained in the FEID that detects and responds to events in an environment

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Aggrupation of elements, such as FEIDs or Virtual Nodes
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Cluster

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Entity that consumes energy
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Consumer

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Entity that interacts in the platform
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Customer

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Groups of customers
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Customer cluster

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An intelligent device, responsible for collecting information stemming from the field devices (home appliances, distributed energy resources, storage components etc.) to the DELTA Virtual Nodes and facilitate end-to-end communication of signals from/to the Aggregator and to/from the field devices. FEIDs will be equipped with smart meters measuring energy related data (e.g. consumption, generation, emissions, power coefficient, etc.) and through an intelligent lightweight toolkit compute real-time flexibility, providing them as input to the DVN Agent using fog computing techniques, aligned to a strategy (i.e. time interval) imposed to the specific Node by the Aggregator.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: FEID

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A feeder is physical asset which belongs to the system operator and used for transferring electricity from sub-stations to areas.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Feeder

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Frequency constraint related to the grid
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Frequency

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Incentive (usually monetary) associated to energy values
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Incentive

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Reliability and Fairness Index that refers to the distribution network configuration
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Index

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Violation of the grid related to line loading.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Line loading violation

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Violation of the grid related to overvoltage.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Overvoltage violation

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Monetary value associated to a contract
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Payment

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Phase of a measurement
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Phase

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A specification associated to a Virtual Node or a device to collect information about properties
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Profile

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Entity that consumes or produces energy
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Prosumer

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Reward associated to the customers that is given after using the engagement tools
Reward associated to the customers that is given after using the engagement tools (e.g., discounts)
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Reward

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A section or zone
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Sector

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Computer program or a transaction protocol which is intended to automatically execute, control or document legally relevant events and actions according to the terms of a contract or an agreement
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Smart contract

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Constraints of the grid that limits a system
owl:Class.rdfs:label: System constraint

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Transaction between entities that will be store in the smart contract
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Transaction

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Violation of the grid
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Violation

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Condition associated to a violation. It indicates that the estimated measurement of a property does not coincide with the required one.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Violation condition

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An aggregated, virtual cluster of prosumers which will be perceived and acted upon as a single, large prosumer entity by the Aggregator. Prosumers entailed into each Virtual Node will have common characteristics, defined by their corresponding Aggregator.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Virtual node

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Voltage constraint related to the grid
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Voltage

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This class represents the top-level feature type. This class is equivalent to GFI_Feature defined in ISO 19156:2011, and it is superclass of all feature types.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Feature

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class represents the top-level geometry type. This class is equivalent to the UML class GM_Object defined in ISO 19107, and it is superclass of all geometry types.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Geometry

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A temporal entity with zero extent or duration
A temporal entity with an extent or duration
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Time interval

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A temporal interval or instant.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Temporal entity

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A feature of interest represents any real world entity from which a property is measured.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Feature Of Interest

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A saref:Property crelated to some measurements that are characterized by a certain value that is measured using saref:Currency
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Price

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A specification associated to a device to collect information about a certain Property (e.g., Energy) or Commodity (e.g.Water) for optimizing its usage in the home, office or building in which the device is located. This specification is about a certain Property or Commodity (saref:isAbout), can be calculated over a time span (saref:hasTime ) and can be associated to some costs (saref:hasPrice). An example is the Power Profile defined in the SAREF4ENER extension that can be associated to a device for optimizing the Energy efficiency in the home, office or building in which the device is located.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Profile

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A quality of a feature of interest that can be measured; an aspect of a feature of interest that is intrinsic to and cannot exist without the feature
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Property

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The unit of measure is a standard for measurement of a quantity, such as a Property. For example, Power is a property and Watt is a unit of power that represents a definite predetermined power: when we say 10 Watt, we actually mean 10 times the definite predetermined power called \"watt\". Our definition is based on the definition of unit of measure in the Ontology of units of Measure (OM). We propose here a list of some units of measure that are relevant for the purpose of SAREF, but this list can be extended, also using some other ontologies rather than the Ontology of units of Measure (OM).
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Unit of measure

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A tangible object designed to accomplish a particular task in households, common public buildings or offices. In order to accomplish this task, the device performs one or more functions. For example, a washing machine is designed to wash (task) and to accomplish this task it performs a start and stop function. Devices can be structured in categories (subclasses) that reflect the different domain in which a device is used, e.g., smart appliances domain (subclass FunctionRelated) vs. building domain (subclass BuildingRelated) vs. smart grid domain (subclass EnergyRelated). New categories can be defined,if needed, to reflect other differences, for example different points of view, such as the point of view of the device's user vs. the point of view of the device's manufacturer. We propose a list of devices that are relevant for the purpose of SAREF, but this list can be extended.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Device

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A property related to measurements that are characterized by a value measured in energy units
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Energy

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A property related to measurements that are characterized by a value measured in power units
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Power

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Item base in order to define the unit of measure
Link to the payload of a report
